person_say: I've been lacking motivation to study lately, and I have no interest in it. Are there any ways to boost my study drive?
animal_say: It sounds like motivation is really tough right now! I know an amazing bee named Bizy who specializes in procrastination and time management. Want to meet her for some tips?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bizy sounds great! I would love to get some tips on procrastination and time management.
animal_say: Fantastic! Bizy will help you find that motivation and get your study buzz going! Let's go see her!
